name: Star Wars: Fantasy Flight Games - Dice Roller
description: This is the Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Role Playing Game Dice Roller. It is used in combination with the Star Wars FFG API-Compatible Character Sheet. NOTE: **Version 2.6 - Compatible with Depreciated Star Wars - Edge of the Empire (API-Compatible) Character Sheet** Version 3.0 - Compatible with Depreciated Star Wars - Edge of the Empire (API-Compatible) Character Sheet - Added Destiny Rolls** Version 4.0.2.17 - Compatible with Depreciated Star Wars - Edge of the Empire (API-Compatible) Character Sheet - Added code cleanup and Character Sheet Auto Creator** Version 4.0.4.2 - Not Compatible with Depreciated Star Wars - Edge of the Empire (API-Compatible) Character Sheet - Needs to use 4.0.4.0 or higher to utilize. - Added Roll Templates**Version 6.3.0 - Added Skill Roll Suggestion Engine, NPC Sheet, collapsible sections, and much more** Supports, Dice rolling with graphics, Destiny Point Tracking, Critical Injury/Hit Rolls, Over Encumbrance auto setback adding, Skill Rolls, Opposed Rolls, Initiative Rolls, Auto Character Sheet creation, and Debugging.**API Commands:**r** **!eed g# y# b# blk# r# p# w# or g#+# or g#-# - Rolls Dice**!eed CharacterID(character) destiny RegisterPlayer** - Syncs Destiny Pool to what is listed on the GM's heet (typically only done by players). **!eed characterID(character) 1w destiny doRoll** - Roll a Destiny Point **!eed characterID(character) destiny useLight** - Use a Light Side Destiny Point**!eed characterID(character) destiny sendUpdate** - Force the Players to update their Destiny Point display (typically only done by the GM).**!eed characterID(character) destiny clearPool** - Clear the Destiny Pool**!eed characterID(character) destiny useDark** - Use a Dark Side Destiny Point**!eed resetdice characterID** - Reset Dice in the Dice Pool**crit(roll) crit(roll|#) crit(heal|#)** - Apply a Critical Injury - Added to !eed dice rolls**critShip(roll) critShip(roll|#) critShip(heal|#)** - Apply a Critical Hit - Added to !eed dice rolls**encum(encum_current|encum_threshold)** - Check if over encumberance threshold - Added to !eed dice rolls**skill(char_value|skill_value)** - Roll a Skill - Added to !eed dice rolls**opposed(char_value|skill_value)** - Roll an Opposed check - Added to !eed dice rolls**!eed log on|off|multi|single** - Logging Options**!eed graphics on|off|s|m|l** - Graphics Options**!eed test** - Test 1 of each die.**!eed debug on|off** - Debug mode.**label(Name of Skill)** - Label a skill roll. - Added to !eed dice rolls**npcinit or pcinit and #b #g #y #blk #p #r #w** - Roll an Initiative Check. - Added to !eed dice rolls**upgrade(ability|#) or upgrade(difficulty|#)** - Upgrade the ability or Difficulty of a check. - Added to !eed dice rolls**downgrade(proficiency|#) or downgrade(challenge|#)** - Downgrade the ability or Difficulty of a check. - Added to !eed dice rolls**!charsheet** - Create a blank Character Sheet.
authors: Konrad J.,Steve Day, Arron, Andrew H., Tom F., Akashan, GM Knowledge Rhino,Tim P.
